Class PlayerBehaviour

java.lang.Object
  invaders.Behaviour
      invaders.PlayerBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICollidable, IInputListener, IBehaviour, IPlayer
public class PlayerBehaviour
extends Behaviour
implements IInputListener, IPlayer

PlayerBehaviour - implements movement behaviour for the fish taking the role of 'Player'.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Marc Price
